content: come join us and create a fab sweet stripes hanging basket pattern please create a ravelry project and join our facebook community to share wip photos and have fun join --> ** here 1 ** more details and the pattern as released can be found on my blog post here --> www greenfoxfarmsdesigns com/sweet-stripes-hanging-baskets-crochet-pattern-free crochet along details ✦ begins sunday april 24 2022 ✦ medium basket is free on the blog all sizes are available with the premium pattern upgrade ✦ weekly lives in my fb group on mondays at noon cst supplies needed ✦ worsted weight yarn any fiber ✦ yardage 70 - 220 yards ✦ hook h/8 5 0 mm hook ✦ optional 2 5 - 3 wooden ring schedule ✦ get ready 4/24 - 4/29/22 ✦ week 1 basket base 4/30 - 5/7 ✦ week 2 hanger 5/7 - 5/14 ✦ i will be going live in my fb group linked above monday 4/25 at 12 pm cst to answer questions and kick off the event join live q&a event --> ** here 2 ** ***sweet stripes hanging baskets pattern *** ✦ cute and functional farmhouse baskets ✦ 3 sizes included small medium and large ✦ this basket pattern includes a handle for hanging anywhere ✦ make several baskets to create a storage organization system ✦ small is perfect for small toys garlic spices or spare hand towels ✦ medium will hold larger plants onions potatoes or toiletries ✦ large is a master at containing your bulkiest items like apples bananas or a several stuffed toys ✦ simple construction and easy repeats make this a beginner friendly pattern ✦ quick pattern is great for craft sales ✦ learn to create a magic_ring with included link to video tutorial --> ready for immediate download in pdf form --> this is an easy crochet pattern ✦ **what is included ** ✦ 7 page pdf pattern in us english with american crochet terms your pattern is available to download from your etsy purchases and an email will be sent with a download link as well ✦ **basket sizes ** ✦ small 6 5 wide x 5 5 deep x 11 long medium 8 5 wide x 6 5 deep x 14 long large 10 5 wide x 8 5 deep x 17 long ✦ **materials needed ** ✦ worsted weight 4 yarn 70-220 yards total h 5 0 mm hook yarn needle scissors stitch markers *optional * 2 5 - 3 wooden ring ✦ **pattern key ** ✦ slip_stitch - slip_stitch chain s - chain s single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet decrease - decrease by single_crochet 2 sts together hdc2tog - decrease by half_double_crochet 2 sts together ✦ ✦ ***green fox farms designs original crochet pattern *** ✦ ✦ due to the nature of digital downloads there are no refunds for this item i am here to help if you have any questions my email and social media contacts are included with each pattern purchase as
